name: TeleMirror
description: App helps mirroring newly created post from Telegram channels.

CHAT_MAPPING.description: Mapping between source and target channels (with their IDs (-100...)). Example: [-100source1,-100source2:-100target];[-100source3:-100target2];

TIMEOUT_MIRRORING.description: Delay in sec between sending or editing messages. Default is 0.1 seconds

REMOVE_URLS.description: Removing urls from incoming messages (true or false)

REMOVE_URLS_WL.description: White list for removing URLs separated by commas
